entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New error after updating from RC1 to RC2: Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LogHelper.IsEnabled #51280
  • SendPasswordResetLinkAsync Identity RC2 - breakpoint never hit + not clear what it is for #51278
  • [.NET 8 RC2] Add DataAnnotiationsValidator to the identity template Login.razor #51277
  • Global option has no effect on the Blazor Web App template when Auth is selected in NET8 RC2. #51274
  • Missing Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.3.1.12 #51273
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #51272
  • Perf regression: mapaction #51271
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #51270
  • Blazor crash in render diff internals #51267
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-44487: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #51264
  • Static routes as string parameters for better SSR (enhancement nav) experience. #51263
  • Blazor WebAssembly throws: No .NET call dispatcher has been set. #51258
    Backlog
  • NewtonsoftJsonHubProtocol does not seem to respect setting for MaxDepth #51254
  • [API Proposal]: Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters to OAuthOptions/OpenIdConnectOptions #51250
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add support to the QuickGrid paginator for static server rendering #51249
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Request to customize the http request header sent by HttpClient created in Blazor #51247

Closed

  • [Blazor] Interactive server components can't receive Blazor endpoint updates during circuit reconnection #51082
    8.0.0
  • RequestDelegateGenerator intercepts incorrect methods #51233
  • Blazor template hamburger menu renders incorrectly on Android Chrome #51246
  • Perf regression: json #51239
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #51251
  • Improve default value handling in RDG #51241
  • Use Date Pipe for Angular Client #39274
    Backlog
  • Rewrite React template as function component with hooks #40540
    .NET 8 Planning
  • The DailyBuilds page does not contain any links to Linux installers #51176
  • IHtmlContent can break ExceptionHandlerMiddleware and DeveloperExceptionPgaeMiddleware. Resulting in a blank page in production. #50825
  • Razor Class Library not rendering/serving static content (i.e. "_content/{PACKAGE}/file.js") on MACOS #50715
  • AuthenticationState should detect changes to cookie states outside Context #50858
  • WPF/Blazor Hybrid - web events not fired when Razor pages are in a separate Razor control library #50990
  • Blazor automatically detects when a new version is available and attempts to update itself. #51257
  • Add AdditionalAuthorizationParameters for OAuth/OIDC #39243
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Register_create New Account_Status Messages: Narrator is not announcing error message appeared when required fields are kept empty. #51156
    8.0.0
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Use A Local Account to Login_Label or instructions: No visual instructions are provided for the sighted users to identify the input fields are required fields. #51153
    8.0.0
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_login_Non-Text Contrast :Color contrast ratio of "Remember me" checkbox is (1.819:1) which is less than required 3:1 #51127
    8.0.0
  • add exception in documentation with nginx and cloudflare #45522
    8.0.0
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextWithFilter #50982
  • Perf improvement: json #51207
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #51213
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json #51214
  • Perf improvement: updates #51238
  • Mvc.Testing.Handlers.RedirectHandler => MaxRedirects does not allow 0 #50925
  • [Blazor] Page created in Client project is not discovered from URL in .NET 8 RC1 #51237

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Invoke `LocationChanged` for interactive components when an enhanced navigation occurs #51279
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51276
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Remove temporary APIs now Razor compiler is updated #51252
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Defer enhanced component updates until reconnection circuit completes #51242
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #51265
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #51266
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Rename metrics tag exception.type to error.type #51084
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Add namespace and assembly check before interception #51243
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Blazor Web Template Accessibility #51231
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Fix MaxRedirects check in RedirectHandler #51245
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Emit action attribute when not explicit. #51130
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51067
    feature-output-caching, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0.0
  • Remove MapIdentityApi's InfoResponse.Claims property #51177
    Servicing-approved, area-identity
